comments.author: rokusan
comments.content:
Hello there! I ran across this as a "possibly related" blog to my blog (rokusan.wordpress.com), which is a hodgepodge of stories about life as a foreigner, in Japan.

Your first year there sounds like an adventure. Are you still there, two years later? The thing I found most striking about Japan is that, even years after you leave it, it never leaves you.

I hope you had many more excellent and fun experiences in Japan. Best wishes ~
